name: Christian Organization for Social Service
briefDescription: 1.	To perform acts  of charity and render service  to  those in need , especially  the poor  and  the  distressed, irrespective of race , cast  or creed2.	To engage in social  service  activities  aimed  at improving  the economic, educational and social  conditions  of the  poor  of whatever occupations  irrespective , of race , caste  or creed.3.	For the  achievements  of objectives  of the society  it is  competent for the  society to formulate and  execute schemes , programmes and  projects . •	To provide the  basic  necessities of food, clothing, medicine, education, housing and employment •	For the  improvement  of agriculture, promotion  of animal  husbandry, establishment  of workshop and training centers
